About Me

Shruti Bhargava

I am a senior year undergraduate student pursuing Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Kanpur. Last summer, I interned at Microsoft Research, Bangalore with the Machine Learning group working on anomaly detection. Previously I was a Research Fellow at Max Planck Institute for Informatics, Saarbrucken. I enjoy designing algorithms for challenging problems in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision.
